name: kahua-attribute-generator
description: Generate Kahua XML attribute, label, DataTag, Field and FieldDef fragments from selected lines.

commands.title: Create Attributes From Selection For Extension
Create Attributes From Selection For Supplement

kahua.tokens.attributeLabelFormat.description: Format for attribute label token. {prefix} and {name} will be replaced.

kahua.tokens.attributeDescriptionFormat.description: Format for attribute description token. {prefix} and {name} will be replaced.

kahua.tokens.dataTagNameFormat.description: Format for DataTag Name. {prefix} and {name} will be replaced.

kahua.tokens.labelKeyFormat.description: Format for label key. {prefix} and {name} will be replaced.

kahua.tokens.labelValueFormat.description: Format for label value. {label} will be replaced with the selected text.

kahua.defaultPrefix.extension.description: Default prefix for attributes generated in extension mode.

kahua.defaultPrefix.supplement.description: Default prefix for attributes generated in supplement mode.
